newsitem.title: USA: Most IMM currency futures weaken in light trade.
newsitem.headline: Most IMM currency futures weaken in light trade.

text.p: May 22 - IMM currency futures were mostly lower in light afternoon trade. June yen broke to $0.008638, while June marks trimmed gains to $0.5903. Sterling widened losses, with June falling through 100-day moving avg of $1.6312. Pesos turned lower after June set a contract high of $0.126100.
